description: As a boy growing up in the Bronx, Mr. Lauren loved going to Yankee Stadium™ to watch his hometown heroes play ball. This unisex Soft Cotton turtleneck celebrates Mr. Lauren's long-standing love of the Bronx Bombers™ and the game of baseball.
fitting_details: The fit of this style is based on our standard men's sizing. We suggest customers who typically order Polo Ralph Lauren's women's apparel to order one size smaller than their usual size.
For example, if you typically order a women's large, we suggest ordering a size medium when purchasing this style.
Size medium has a 27½" body length (front and back), an 18½" shoulder, a 41" chest, and a 34½" sleeve length. Sleeve length is taken from the center back of the neck and changes 1" between sizes.
Turtleneck with the New York Yankees™ logo embroidered at the right side.
Signature embroidered Pony at left chest.
Male model is 6'1"/185 cm. Female model is 5'10"/178 cm. Both are wearing a size medium.
